nodes.bodyText: Can we use the page translations we have? It's either under command or misc.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -546,30 +532,27 @@ public void alts(
       int pages = (altAccounts.size() + perPage - 1) / perPage;
 
       Component pageNum =

nodes.bodyText: I would modify Audience to add showTitle and the hotbar with the new components. Make them defaults and use TextTranslations
